attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION AND HELP TO MAKE A STAND TO STOP BULLYING IN SCHOOLS.
HOW MANY CHILDREN HAVE TO SUFFER,,AT THE HAND OF BULLYS,THE EDUCATION SYSTEM MUST LOOK AT THE STATISTICS OF LIVES THAT HAVE BEEN LOST OR RUINED  BY  TORRMENT,.HOW MANY CHILDREN HAVE TO WORRY AND BE SCARED TO GO TO SCHOOL,THE EDUCATION SYSTEM IS FAILING THEM, AND ALSO THE PARENTS ,THERE NEEDS TO BE PROPER EXCLUSIONS IN PLACE IN SCHOOLS FOR THE KIDS THAT TORMMENT OTHERS ,SO THAT THEY UNDERSTAND HOW TO BEHAVE IN SOCIETY,AND THAT BULLYING IS UNACEPTABLE,IF THIS PROBLEM IS NOT SOLVED MORE INOCENT LIVES WILL BE LOST OR RUINED ,AND MORE AND MORE CHILDREN WILL BE ADDED TO THE STATISTICS ,OUR INNOCENT CHILDREN SHOULD NOT BE CLASSED AS A NUMBER..............................PLEASE SIGN  AND LET OUR CHILDREN BE HEARD.....................................
